page.title: UFO
page.t: Fleets n/a while docked(used to indicate fleet management cannot be done while docked yet)
No fleets detected(notification text for fleet report if no fleets exist)
no(label used to indicate that a certain NPC type is needed)
Real-time Fleet Status Report(notification caption for fleet status reports)
consisting of %1 ship\(s\)(text for fleet status reports)
%1 capital ship\(s\)(text for fleet status reports)
detected %1 enemy ship\(s\)(text for fleet status reports)
in zone %1(text for fleet status reports)
Engaging enemy ship\(s\)(text for fleet status reports)
Not supported yet(label used in case player is trying to assign fighter to capital ship)
Thank you for upgrading to UFO V0.6.1. This version features compatibility with X:R 3.20 by making the UI accessible via the sidebar (in the INFO section).\nHafe vun playing!
Thank you for installing UFO V0.6.1. You can access the main functions of this mod via the sidebar (in the INFO section).\nHafe vun playing!
